nodes.text: In 23 ABY, a female conspirator was involved in the bombing of the dining hall of the Hapan Queen Mother's royal residence, Fountain Palace, located on the planet Hapes. The bomb was intended to kill the matriarch of Hapes, Ta'a Chume, and her granddaughter Tenel Ka. After sending Tenel Ka to safety, Ta'a Chume headed up the investigation of the bombing and eventually caught the conspirator. However, before Ta'a Chume could question her, the criminal was poisoned by an assassin while under guard.
The bomb conspirator was mentioned in the young readers novel Young Jedi Knights: Lightsabers by Kevin J. Anderson and Rebecca Moesta, which was published in 1996.
